seo.title: Contact {{brand.fullName}} | Bookings, Directions & Opening Hours
seo.description: Call 01223 603907 or email {{brand.supportEmail}} for bookings, groups, and takeaway. Find us 2 minutes from Premier Inn & Travelodge at 231 Newmarket Road, Cambridge CB5 8JE (opposite Cambridge Retail Park).
